# Math Without Alt Text in PDF/UA-1

PDF/UA-1 requires alternative text for Formula elements.

- **LaTeX**: Auto-generates MathML via `tagging=on` + `unicode-math` (LuaLaTeX)
- **Typst**: Requires explicit alt text - errors at compile time

Note: PR #13872 adds `alt` attribute support for equations in Quarto.

## Inline Math

The quadratic formula is $x = \frac{-b \pm \sqrt{b^2 - 4ac}}{2a}$.

## Display Math

$$E = mc^2$$

## Integral

$$\int_0^\infty e^{-x^2} dx = \frac{\sqrt{\pi}}{2}$$
